means: 使麻醉，使麻木( anesthetize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Minutes later, anesthetized, Julian lay flat on the operating table.
sentence.Network_cn: 几分钟后, 医生给朱利安注射了麻药, 他直挺挺地躺在手术台上.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To study the hemodynamic effect of EBF in anesthetized rats.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 研究EBF对麻醉大鼠血流动力学的影响.

sentence.Network_en: Effect of Yiqi Tongmai oral liquid on hemodynamics in anesthetized dogs.
sentence.Network_cn: 益气通脉口服液对麻醉犬心脏血流动力学的影响.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The patient must be anesthetized before the operation ., 病人在手术前必须实行麻醉.
